DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine duloxetine 60 mg daily ( QD ) reduce pain severity patient osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee pain compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Duloxetine Patients With Osteoarthritis Knee Pain
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient osteoarthritis knee pain great equal 14 day month 3 month prior study entry . Have rating great equal 4 BPI average pain item ( Question 3 Brief Pain Inventory [ BPI ] modify short form ) screen randomization Have previous exposure duloxetine . Have previous diagnosis psychosis , bipolar disorder , schizoaffective disorder . Have Major Depression Disorder define Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition , assess Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( Sheehan et al . 1998 ) , diagnose within past year . Have history substance abuse dependence within past year , exclude nicotine caffeine . Are take excluded medication discontinue screen visit . Have current pending disability compensation litigation issue may compromise response treatment , opinion investigator . Have treatment monoamine oxidase inhibitor ( MAOI ) within 14 day randomization potential need use MAOI study within 5 day discontinuation study drug . Have positive urine drug screen substance abuse exclude medication . Are pregnant breastfeeding . Have serious cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , hematologic illness , medical psychiatric condition , opinion investigator , would compromise participation likely lead hospitalization course study . Have history recurrent seizure febrile seizure . Are judged investigator suicidal risk . Have uncontrolled narrowangle glaucoma . Have acute liver injury ( hepatitis ) severe cirrhosis ( Child Pugh Class C ) . Have know hypersensitivity duloxetine inactive ingredient patient frequent severe allergic reaction multiple medication . Have frequent fall could result hospitalization could compromise response treatment . Have confound painful condition may interfere assessment index joint , , knee . ( Knee pain predominant pain . Mild OA pain joint allow . ) Have diagnosis inflammatory arthritis ( , rheumatoid arthritis ) autoimmune disorder ( exclude inactive Hashimoto 's thyroiditis ) . Have receive intraarticular hyaluronate steroid , joint lavage , invasive therapy knee past 3 month . Have knee arthroscopy index knee within past year joint replacement index knee anytime . Have surgery plan study index joint . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 40 . Use acupuncture , chiropractic maneuver , transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) , similar procedure aim relieve kind pain . Patients anticipated investigator require use analgesic agent include limited nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , acetaminophen/paracetamol , opioids , exclude medication duration study . Are unwilling unable comply data collection method use record patient rat outcome data .
